name: choco mitts
notes:
**if you like my desings, i will be very happy if you add me to your friends and follow me on instagram [@comfortzoneknits][2].**

choco are pretty and eye-catching fingerless mittens featuring beautiful cable pattern on top of the mitten. mitts are knit seamlessly in the round. the pattern includes both, chart and written instructions.

sizes
{ 1, 2 }
1 – small adult – finished palm circumference, unstretched: 16.1 cm / 6.5”
2 – large adult - finished palm circumference, unstretched: 17.8 cm / 7.25”
length: 19cm / 7.5”

yarn
for a pair of mitts you’ll need about 150m / 165y of any dk weight yarn.
sample mitts were made with woollala only merino dk (100% wool-merino; 220m / 240y per 100g), sepia colorway.
note: the yardage is estimated.

needles
3.5mm / us #4 circular needles for magic loop technique or dpns, or size needed to get the right gauge;
3.25mm / us #3 circular needles for magic loop technique or dpns, or one size smaller than the gauge needles.

gauge
24 sts and 34 rnds = 10 x 10  cm / 4 x 4 “ - in stockinette stitch pattern worked with 3.5mm / us #4 needles, after wet blocking. 
note: adjust needle size if necessary to get given gauge.
